song_lyrics: Sakhī Bhūdhar bhukhyo chhe bhāvno,
Avilokī re, juve antarnī āsh ke...
Sakhī pachhe kare chhe e prītḍī,
Pahelī tākī re, jyāre kāḍhe tapās ke... Bhūdhar 1
Sakhī uparne range rāche nahi,
Dambh dekhī re, rahe dayāḷu dūr ke... Bhūdhar 2
Sakhī prapanche piyu na pāmīe,
Sāche dile re, Hari rahe chhe hajūr ke... Bhūdhar 3
Sakhī mānunīnu mān moḍvā,
Ṭev paḍī re, albelāne ang ke... Bhūdhar 4
Sakhī ahamkār na rahyo ehno,
Jeṇe kīdho re, Shyāmaḷīyāno sang ke... Bhūdhar 5
Sakhī garvaganjan enu nām chhe,
Evī moṭap re, emā ati apār ke... Bhūdhar 6
Sakhī jeshu kare Hari prītḍī,
Tene swapne re, rahevā na diye sansār ke... Bhūdhar 7
Sakhī nīrmānī game chhe Nāthne,
Vishāy vāsanā re, jenī pāmī virām ke... Bhūdhar 8
Sakhī adhghaḍī na rahe aḷgo,
Evā janthī re, sakhī sundar Shyām ke... Bhūdhar 9
Sakhī premnī dorīe pātḷo,
Bandhāṇo re, sakhī chhe baḷvant ke... Bhūdhar 1
Sakhī Nishkuḷānandno Nāthjī,
Lāḍīlo re, māro koḍīlo kanth re... Bhūdhar 11
title: Sakhī Bhūdar bhūkhyo chhe bhāvno

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-458: Sadguru Nishkulanand Swami

Category: Updeshna Pad
